name: The Egg (play-c)
description:
In The Egg adventure your job is to help Fairy return The Egg back to happiness castle. where she live, a seemingly easy task, but castle is at top of tallest tree in the kingdom of happiness where an active volcano "VOLC" is in imminent eruption.

Don't let this childish premise fool you, The Egg android mobile game offers intense gameplay to get even experienced players breaking a sweat. Skill and resourcefulness go hand in hand in more than 50 levels that you have to overcome in order to save your precious egg. Jump from nest to nest in your adventure to top of tree, choosing just right moment to move. Keep in mind how each nest moves, its speed, and distance between them.

With incredible graphics, an well-adapted soundtracks for its fantasy settings, and gameplay that's as fun as it is challenging; The Egg is the perfect Android game for whenever you want to kill some time.


Features
● The Egg has a unique 3d arcade adventure gameplay style.
● Exciting gameplay and adventurous realm.
● Rich HD graphics and 3D visuals.
● High quality music and sound effects.
● The Egg has 5 Chapters and Full featured 50 levels.
● Support both mobile and tablet devices.
● The Egg is Very easy to play.
● The Egg is so fun, challenging, addictive and full of happiness.
● The Egg for android is free to play.
● Supported languages : Chinese, Spanish, English, Hindi, Arabic, Portuguese, Bengali, Russian, Japanese, German, Vietnamese, French, Turkish, Italian
● now you can play The Egg offline

★ Requires in-game acceptance of Play(c) terms of service.
★ The Egg is free to play, but If you wanted to buy extras or speed things up you can buy in-app purchases.
★ Make any in-app purchase to disable auto ads.
★ The Egg also known as : Happiness Ovo, Ei, Tamago, Huevo, Ovum, Anda and Dima.
★ For more details please contact : onlinehelp.play@gmail.com.


The Egg introduced by Play.
